thread.title: getting started

comments.text: below are simple instructions on how to get started in custom conquest
you need units to collect these resources: wood, stone (stn), clay, energy (nrg), and gold.
up to 3 default collector units can harvest the same deposit simultaneously
buildings and most air units require energy every turn to maintain
you lose the game when all of your headquarters are destroyed
an additional headquarters cost 20 of every resource except energy

thread.latestCommentText: an additional headquarters cost 20 of every resource except energy
